sqlMap.sql:
from COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE /* 공통상세코드 */ where 1 = 1
and COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE.CODE_ID = #codeId# /* 공통상세코드.코드ID */
and COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE.USE_AT = #useAt# /* 공통상세코드.사용여부 */

/* 서브0102 목록 조회(멀티건) */ select COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE.CODE_ID /* 공통상세코드.코드ID */ , (select CODE_ID_NM from COMTCCMMNCODE where COMTCCMMNCODE.CODE_ID = COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE.CODE_ID) as CODE_ID_NM , COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE.CODE /* 공통상세코드.코드 */ , COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE.CODE_NM /* 공통상세코드.코드명 */ , COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE.CODE_DC /* 공통상세코드.코드설명 */ , COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE.USE_AT /* 공통상세코드.사용여부 */ , COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* 공통상세코드.최초등록시점 */ , COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE.FRST_REGISTER_ID /* 공통상세코드.최초등록자ID */ , COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* 공통상세코드.최종수정시점 */ , COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE.LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* 공통상세코드.최종수정자ID */ from ( select rownum as rn , tb.* from ( select COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE.CODE_ID /* 공통상세코드.코드ID */ , COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE.CODE /* 공통상세코드.코드 */ , COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE.CODE_NM /* 공통상세코드.코드명 */ , COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE.CODE_DC /* 공통상세코드.코드설명 */ , COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE.USE_AT /* 공통상세코드.사용여부 */ , COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* 공통상세코드.최초등록시점 */ , COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE.FRST_REGISTER_ID /* 공통상세코드.최초등록자ID */ , COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* 공통상세코드.최종수정시점 */ , COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE.LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* 공통상세코드.최종수정자ID */
) tb ) COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE where rn between #firstIndex# + 1 and #firstIndex# + #recordCountPerPage#
sqlMap.select: /* 서브0102 목록 카운트 조회(단건) */ select count(*) as cnt
